Diamond::

She slithered to a small, one bot transport pod. She transformed into 
bot mode and got inside. She sat down and fired up the engines.  She 
took off and headed high into the sky.  She was cruising near the 
upper atmosphere and following the signal that Zardus had given her 
to find.  She had a smile on her face and a plan developed in her 
head. She flew the pod up higher into the sky and took it to the 
envelope. She then activated the pods cloaking device so it wouldn't 
be picked up by scanners. She then kept it there untill she found the 
signal she was looking for, KitKat's.  She angeled the pod and sent 
it into a nose dive.  She  held her breath as the pod went into a 
spin, hurtling down towards the ground.  She cut off the engines when 
it was still about 2000 feet above the ground. The cloaking device 
shut off and so made the pod look like it was falling from from 
space.  The pod dived and spun, gaining speed as it fell to the 
ground.  It crashed just a mile from KitKat's base.  The pod lay 
motionless on the ground.  It was relatively unharmed.  Diamond stood 
up, a little shaken, but ok. She turned on the computer and activated 
the voice functions for the pod. The pod wouldn't work unless the 
computer recognized her voice only. 
She stood up and stretched. Her neck was sore from the whiplash 
forced by the impact. But she was alright otherwise. She opened a 
link to the base. She made her voice sound a little trouble and 
worried. "Hello? Is anyone there? My pod crashed and I can use some 
help. Is there any predacon out there?"  She knew that KitKat would 
receive the transmission and think that she could make her an ally.  
She smiled and waited for a responce.
